ApicalDendrite - Class in CompartmentPackage
Implements an apical dendrite which takes the activation of the apical tuft as input (from this.myNeuron) and runs it through multiplier * logistic(gradient * input) to produce a value (activation) between 0 and multiplier which will be used to modulate the effect of the basal dendrite's activation at the axon hillock.
ApicalDendrite(PyramidalNeuron, double, double, int) - Constructor for class CompartmentPackage.ApicalDendrite
apical dendrite will enable interaction between apical tuft and basal dendrite
apicalDendrite - Variable in class NeuronPackage.PyramidalNeuron
 
apicalGradient - Variable in class NeuronPackage.PyramidalNeuronInfo
 
apicalMultiplier - Variable in class NeuronPackage.PyramidalNeuronInfo
 
ApicalTuft - Class in CompartmentPackage
Apical tuft compartment, part of pyramidal neuron, receiving contextual inputs
ApicalTuft(PyramidalNeuron, int, double) - Constructor for class CompartmentPackage.ApicalTuft
 
apicalTuft - Variable in class NeuronPackage.PyramidalNeuron
 
AxonHillock - Class in CompartmentPackage
spiking compartment intended for pyramidal neurons does not currently use any synapses, but these can be created (using the code in AbstractCompartment) and implemented in runAndSpike
AxonHillock(PyramidalNeuron, int, double, double) - Constructor for class CompartmentPackage.AxonHillock
 
axonHillock - Variable in class NeuronPackage.PyramidalNeuron
